Action.author: alexander.shekhovcov
Action.body: Looks like there is some validation on CLI level because the invalid requests are not received on the Node side. I guess the ticket should be solved on CLI side.

Action.author: krw910
Action.body: ~spivachuk please provide a sample transaction that is valid, but rejected by the CLI. Once you have the example move the ticket to the bottom of the backlog for review.
